comment.author: 11572312@N00
comment._content: Willie Ritchie has other LOC photos in this series. He fought Tommy McFarland in September 1911 according to this site: cyberboxingzone.com/boxing/ritchie.htm

comment.author: 72253021@N00
comment._content: This is really strange because my grandmother, Grace McFarland, divorced and married again becoming Grace Ritchie.

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: This appears to be Packey (sometimes spelled Packy) McFarland. He did not fight Ritchie. Here is another Bain Collection photo of him from the same session:

comment.author: 63860770@N07
comment._content: I believe you are correct artolog, it does look like Packy McFarland. I will ask for our records to be updated.
